title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend certain expiring provisions, and for other purposes.
content: Emergency Senior Citizens Relief Act of 2010 - Amends the Assistance for Unemployed Workers and Struggling Families Act, title II of the American Recovery and Reinvestment Tax Act of 2009, to extend: (1) through 2011 the $250 economic recovery payments to recipients of Social Security, Supplemental Security Income (SSI) , railroad retirement benefits, and veterans disability compensation or pension benefits. And (2) through 2011 the special tax credit for certain government retirees. Makes additional appropriations through FY2013 to cover such payments.
